For a game that came out in late 2004. I still had the time of my life. It's a fun and nostalgic play. I would highly recommend it to other people who are a fan of realistic FPS games. Upon playing it for the first time, I honestly thought it was a pile. About 2 and half months later, I came back to it and decided to give it a second chance. Upon playing it, I felt like I was in love. Counter-Strike: Source is the first original CS game put into the Source 1 Engine.
Топ игра, стрельба тоже найсовая, читеров очень мало, она лучше, чем CS:GO
It's a really fun game. What makes it special compared to the others is the source engine. It make modding easy thus increasing it's lifespan. The community picked up where Valve lefted it.
